rules.name: Large PR Size Check
rules.description: PRs with too many changes are hard to review
rules.message: This PR is quite large and may be difficult to review. Consider breaking it into smaller, focused changes.

rules.name: Huge PR Size Check
rules.description: PRs with excessive changes should be blocked
rules.message: This PR is too large and must be broken down into smaller changes before it can be reviewed.

rules.name: Entitlements File Modified
rules.description: Entitlements files should be reviewed carefully as they affect app permissions
rules.message: Entitlements file has been modified. Please ensure all changes are necessary and secure.

rules.name: Force Unwrapping Detected
rules.description: Force unwrapping can cause crashes and should be avoided
rules.message: Force unwrapping detected. Consider using optional binding or nil coalescing instead.

rules.name: Print Statements in Production Code
rules.description: Print statements should not be committed to production code
rules.message: Print statement found. Consider using proper logging or removing debug prints.

rules.name: Large File Added
rules.description: Large files can bloat the repository
rules.message: Large file detected. Consider if this file is necessary or if it can be optimized.

rules.name: TODO/FIXME Comments Added
rules.description: Track technical debt and pending work
rules.message: TODO/FIXME comment added. Consider creating a ticket to track this work.

rules.name: Podfile Modified
rules.message: Podfile has been modified. Please ensure all dependency changes are intentional.
